Posts.Content: lioara wrote: Â Hi all, can anyone pls help me with an advice. I am 35 years old and thinking to have prophylactic mastectomy. My mother died from breast cancer when she was 42, she was diagnosed about my age (her sister the same, and few other of her cousins). my genetic testing showed a rare mutation on braca1. Anyone living around New York area can recommend a good breast and reconstruction surgeon? Do you mind sharing your experience? i am a little scared! Thank you! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: looking for DR in NY area lioara johnwayne
